name: Cobalt-B
info:
She might look serious and solemn, but she's actually rather unusual and quirky.
She doesn't have a lot of facial expressions, but once you get to know her, you will see that she's kind and full of ideas and emotions. She might even make an angry face when she's irritated.
She is a master mechanical engineer, but she works with feelings and not theories.
She tunes her creations with her "sixth sense," and often adds completely useless modules because she feels like it...
description:
Cobalt-B, which is not her real name, is a mechanical engineer on the Banges Tech weapon development team. Her position isn't too high up on the corporate ladder, because her test results aren't very good.
Only the people that she works with know that she is, in fact, the ace of the entire team. She doesn't care about basic theories, and only creates extremely effective weapons based on her instinct.
To test these weapons and collect combat data, she occasionally goes on operations with other soldiers and tries her weapons on poor Hyena members.

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description: On the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row. The first attack deals total damage equal to 52.3% of ATK + 3. The second attack deals total damage equal to 75.6% of ATK + 4. The third attack deals total damage equal to 94.5% of ATK + 5. The fourth attack deals total damage equal to 142.8% of ATK + 8 . The fifth attack deals total damage equal to 137.8% of ATK + 7.

skills.name: Charged Shot
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack and release to fire rounds, dealing 95.4% of ATK plus 5 damage, plus an explosion 3 seconds later (or if the target dies), dealing 23.9% of ATK as damage to nearby enemies. Each time the target is dealt damage during the explosion (up to 4 times), AoE is doubled and damage is increased.

skills.name: Jumping Blast
skills.description: While airborne or after jumping once, launch Jumping Blast. Toss a bomb that deals damage equal to 90.8% of ATK plus 5 to enemies in a circle ahead, knocking them back a short distance. Consumes 250 endurance.

skills.name: Aerial Discharge
skills.description: After double-jumping, launch Aerial Discharge in mid-air. Fire an Omnium beam downward. The beam then sweeps forward, dealing damage equal to 33.8% of ATK plus 2.

skills.name: Heavy Bombardment
skills.description: Hold attack button during a normal attack to unleash Suppressing Fire in front, dealing enemies AoE damage equal to 102% of ATK plus 5 in total.

skills.name: Close Quarters
skills.description: Use normal attack right after dodging to trigger Close Quarters. Deal damage equal to 156.1% of ATK plus 8 to targets in a frontal cone area.

skills.name: Barrage
skills.description: Continuously inflict damage in a frontal cone area, dealing total damage equal to 666% of ATK plus 35. Cooldown: 60 seconds.

skills.name: Explosive Rain
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the wielder and throw 3 grenades forward, dealing AoE damage equal to 570% of ATK plus 30 in total and launching the target.

weapon_type.name: Flame
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will ignite the target for 8 seconds, dealing damage equal to 58% of ATK every second. While Ignited, targets' healing effect is reduced by 50%.

weapon_resonance.name: Flame Resonance
weapon_resonance.description: Flame Resonance: Increase flame ATK by 15% and flame resistance by 25%. Activate by equipping 2 or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

advancement: Each round of Barrage deals additional damage equal to 2% of the target's current HP (cannot exceed 180% of ATK).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
Heavy Bombardment branch skill and Close Quarters dodge attack inflict Ion Scorch on targets that are already burned, dealing flame damage equal to 40% of ATK every second for 10 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 32%.
The damage from Ion Scorch increases to 60% of ATK. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skill will refresh the duration of Ion Scorch.

Barrage has a 15-second burning effect. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skill reduces the cooldown of Barrage by 4 seconds. The cooldown of the effect: 1.5 seconds. The DoT burn from the dodge skill also triggers a cooldown reduction effect.

traits.name: Lingering Warmth
traits.description: After Cobalt-B uses her discharge skill, restore a random amount of weapon charge between 50 to 120 points.

traits.name: Sparks
traits.description: After Cobalt-B uses her discharge skill, restore a random amount of weapon charge between 90 to 180 points.
